short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reveal information that giant corporations have on you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Project Robinhood is a simple way for you to see what data companies like Linkedin and Google know about you. When you are logged into your google and linkedin account, Project Robinhood is able to show you the data that has been collected on you. Legally you have the right to see this information and we make it easy for you to access it. 

Download today to see your data.
